item.title: Advanced CT Scan Facility Inaugurated at Gadwal District Hospital to Provide Affordable, Quality Diagnostic Services
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: In a major step towards strengthening public healthcare infrastructure in Jogulamba Gadwal district, District Collector B.Y.M. Santosh announced the establishment of a state-of-the-art CT Scan facility at the District Government General Hospital. The facility, worth Rs. 2.5 crore, was inaugurated on Friday by Gadwal MLA Bandla Krishna Mohan Reddy, along with the District Collector.
The inauguration took place at the Radiology Lab of the Government General Hospital in the district headqu...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
